title: Machine Learning is Magic
excerpt: Perhaps you have heard of the the sophisticated, elegant
>Cloud-to-Butt plugin, which searches through the text on a website for the phrase “The Cloud” and replaces it with “My Butt”.

title: Talking Talking Machines
excerpt: >Talking Machines is currently THE machine learning podcast. Last fall when it started out, I was intrigued that someone was starting a podcast focusing specifically on machine learning. But I didn’t really listen until this summer, which was my loss. Now that I’m catching up on it, I think it’s terrific.
